title-group.article-title: MATRICIAL FILTERS AND CRYSTALLOGRAPHIC COMPOSITE DILATION WAVELETS

abstract.p: In 2006 Guo, Labate, Lim, Weiss, and Wilson introduced the theory of MRA composite dilation wavelets. We continue their work by studying the filter properties of such wavelets and present several important examples.
